lines.content: üöÄ Introducing **MattBot**: Your Ultimate Task Management Assistant! üìÜ

Are you drowning in a sea of to-dos, overwhelmed by deadlines, and struggling to keep up with your busy schedule? Say goodbye to chaos and hello to efficiency with MattBot ‚Äì your new personal task management assistant!
- üìå **Seamless Task Management**: MattBot effortlessly organizes your tasks, events, and deadlines all in one place, ensuring nothing slips through the cracks.
- üóìÔ∏è **Smart Event Scheduler**: Never miss an important meeting or appointment again! MattBot helps you schedule events.
- üöÄ **Effortless Deadlines**: Set deadlines with ease, and MattBot will keep you updated on your progress and notify you when time is running out.
- üîç **Advanced Search**: Quickly find the information you need with powerful search capabilities. No more digging through endless notes or calendars!
- ~~üìä Analytics & Insights: Gain valuable insights into your productivity trends with MattBot's data-driven analytics. Understand where your time goes and make improvements.~~
- ~~üîí Security First: Your data is your business, and we take security seriously. MattBot employs state-of-the-art encryption to keep your information safe and sound.~~
- üì± Cross-Platform Access: Access MattBot on your preferred device ‚Äì whether it's your smartphone, tablet, or computer. Stay organized wherever you are!
- ~~ü§ñ AI-Powered Assistance: MattBot utilizes cutting-edge artificial intelligence to adapt to your unique needs, offering smart suggestions and automating repetitive tasks.~~
- ~~üéØ Goal Tracking: Set and track your goals effortlessly with MattBot's goal management feature. Achieve your dreams one step at a time!~~
üéÅ Special Offer: Try MattBot today and receive a 7-day free trial of our premium features!
üöÄ Don't let disorganization hold you back. Take control of your tasks, events, and deadlines with MattBot ‚Äì your ultimate task management assistant!
üëâ Get started now at [www.SungMatt.com/MattBot](http://www.SungMatt.com/MattBot) and experience the future of productivity! üëà
MattBot ‚Äì Your Tasks, Events, and Deadlines, All in One Place! üìÖ‚úÖ

MattBot is able to add Todos, Deadlines and Events to your calendar.
MattBot is also able to delete tasks.
MattBot is able to keep track of which tasks are done and not done.
MattBot can list all your tasks for you.
MattBot can find a specific task matching a keyword!
MattBot can tag your tasks, untag them, and find tasks matching your tags!
MattBot remembers your tasks even after closing and re-opening it!
Bonus: All tasks are saved onto a human-readable flat file, ensuring your tasks never get lost.
### Adding a Todo, Deadline or Event
Easily add tasks to your calendar by using the following commands!
A Todo is a type of Task that has no due date.
A Deadline is an item with a singular due date.
deadline Write on Derek's birthday card /by 20231029T2359
An Event is a Task with a start date and an end date.
event [Event Name] /from [Start Date, in YYYYMMDDTHHMM] /to [End Date, in YYYYMMDDTHHMM]
Used to show all your tasks.
Tasks can be marked as done, as well as unmarked (undone!).
First use list to find out which task you are attempting to mark, then use `mark` to mark it as done!
First use list to find out which task you are attempting to unmark, then use `unmark` to mark it as done!
Finding a task has never been simpler. `find` is able to locate a keyword in any part of the task.
List of events with "Birthday" inside them.
Add a tag to a Task.
Removes a tag from a Task.
